description: A059941 translated from binary to decimal.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: a[n_] := (id = Drop[ IntegerDigits[n+1, 2], 1]+1; an = {}; Do[ PrependTo[an, If[Take[id, k] == Take[id, -k], 1, 0]], {k, 1, Length[id]}]; FromDigits[an, 2]); Table[a[n], {n, 1, 78}](* _Jean-FranÃ§ois Alcover_, Nov 21 2011 *)
prog: (Haskell)import Data.List (inits, tails)a059942 n = a059942_list !! (n-1)a059942_list = map (foldr (\d v -> v * 2 + d) 0) $ f a030341_tabf where   f (xs:xss)     | 0 `elem` xs = f xss     | otherwise = map fromEnum (zipWith (==)                   (tail $ inits xs) (reverse $ init $ tails xs)) : f xss-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Apr 03 2014
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Feb 14 2001
